Description :
        Miki thought her life was on track. She had been going steady with her boyfriend for a year, and was starting to think about getting married to him. However, that all comes crashing down on her when Miki catches her boyfriend in bed with another woman. Alone and miserable, she comes across an abandoned cat left out in a box in the cold rain. Seeing something of herself in the lonely animal, she takes it home.
